section.para: The declaration val x = G, followed by expression F, is actually just a different way of writing the expression F <x< G. Thus, val shares all of the behavior of the pruning combinator. (This is also true when a pattern is used instead of variable name x).

section.title: Type
section.para: When a declaration val x = F occurs, the expression in scope for the declaration is typechecked using the assumption x :: T, where T is the type of F.
